Hi Dana - sorry to revive a year old discussion, but this is the closest thread I can find for the HTML-in-email problem that Ian described.
Iâ€™ve run into this problem, and my recent support ticket seems to be unable to find a resolution to this.
I had seen HTML from a personalisation token working only recently in my account, but the behaviour seems to have changed apropos of nothing.  Is there any chance you could point me in the right direction or forward me something to pass on for my support ticket?

Hi Simon! Unfortunately, I no longer work in Support- I work in a different department now- so I don't have not kept up if this issue has re-opened, if it's a new issue, etc. My work these days has been focused on the sending network, rather than the tool. If you've opened a Support ticket and they've not been able to find an answer, provide them with as many examples as possible - screenshots or videos is always helpful. I apologize, I wish I could be more helpful!

You could always post a new post here and perhaps one of our dev support members can check into it for you. :)
